text: Shanghai Noon is a 2000 American-Hong Kong martial arts western comedy movie starring Jackie Chan, Owen Wilson and Lucy Liu. The first in the Shanghai movie series and marking the directorial debut of Tom Dey, Shanghai Noon was written by Alfred Gough and Miles Millar. sequels Shanghai Knights and Shanghai Dawn. == Cast == * Jackie Chan as Chon Wang * Owen Wilson as Roy O'Bannon / Wyatt Earp * Lucy Liu as Princess Pei Pei * Brandon Merrill as Indian Wife / Falling Leaves * Xander Berkeley as Marshal Nathan Van Cleef * Roger Yuan as Lo Fong * Kate Luyben as Fifi * Jason Connery as Calvin Andrews * Simon R. Baker as Little Feather * Walton Goggins as Wallace * Henry O as Royal Interpeter * Yu Rong Guang as Emperor Guard * Eric Chen as Emperor Guard * Yuen Biao as Saloon Fighter (uncredited) == Stunts == * Andy Cheng * Wu Gang * Nicky Li Category:2000 action movies Category:2000 comedy movies Category:2000s Western (genre) movies Category:American action movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Hong Kong action movies Category:Hong Kong comedy movies Category:Movies set in Alberta Category:Movies set in Canada Category:Movies set in China Category:Movies set in Nevada Category:Movies set in the 1880s
title: Shanghai Noon
